description:
Scooby-Doo! Night of 100 Frights is a MetroidVania 3D Platformer game
made by Heavy Iron Studios and published by THQ.

The Mystery Gang are invited to the Mystic Manor by Holly, but shortly after arriving Scooby-Doo
gets separated from the rest of the crew, Scooby must navigate a wide variety of levels to collect new inventions
and scooby snacks so that he can explore new areas and look for his friends, while
he fights off his old foes along the way.

Release_1_3_0.description:
## Snacksanity

-Renamed all snacks in North Side of game to be more helpful
-Renames for West and East Side coming in later patch

## Misc

-Various fixes to logic across the game.
Release_1_3_0.title: Major Release v1.3.0 | Full | Naming Revisit

Release_1_3_1.description:
# Minor Bugfix Release

## Logic
- Fixed Cellar 4 Snacks to be properly defined logically
- Fixed several locations broken by last update

## Cosmetic
- Changed Snack Region Names to be less intrusive/obvious
Release_1_3_1.title: Minor Release v1.3.1 | Full

Release_1_3_2.description:
## Snacksanity

-Renamed all snacks in West Side of game to be more helpful
-Renames for East Side coming in later patch, North Side Renamed in 1.3.0

## Misc

- Fix to bug allowing the Snack Goal to be usable without Snacksanity on
- Fix to issue with Creepy 2 Key Pickups becoming uncollectible.  From now on if they become uncollectible the client will auto-collect them.
Release_1_3_2.title: Major Release v1.3.2 | Full | Naming Revisit Pt 2

Release_1_3_3.title: Major Release v1.3.3 | Full | Naming Revisit Pt3

Release_1_3_3r2.title: Major Release v1.3.3 | Full | Naming Revisit Pt3

Release_1_3_3r3.title: Major Release v1.3.3 | Full | Naming Revisit Pt3

Release_1_3_3r4.title: Major Release v1.3.3 | Full | Naming Revisit Pt3

Release_1_3_3r5.description:
## Snacksanity

-Finished Renaming Snack Locations, the entire game should now have more descriptive location names for every single snack.
-Reordered Location List so the Spoiler Log generates in the correct order again for the reordered/renamed snacks.


## HOTFIX
-Fixed Client Snack Names being out of order
-Added missing snack rules for Cellar 1, Hedge 3 and Pier 3
Release_1_3_3r5.title: Major Release v1.3.3 | Full | Naming Revisit Pt3

Release_1_3_4.title: Minor Release v1.3.4 | Full | QOL and Logic Fixes

Release_1_3_4r2.description:
# ISO Patching

From a PR of JacobMIX the patch file can now be directly opened by Open Patch in the Archipelago Launcher.

The original method of opening the client and just selecting the .apno100f will still work, but now there are additional ways to get to the same end point

# Fixes
Fixes a logic issue in some cases for All Scares 3.

Fixes a logic issue where the Cellar to Clamor connection was improperly ignoring Helmet as a requirement

Furthermore, I have chosen to disable the entry to the Black Knight fight from Cower in the Tower if the player does not have the helmet - this prevents a softlock for that specific check.
Release_1_3_4r2.title: Minor Release v1.3.4 | Full | QOL and Logic Fixes

Release_1_3_5.description:
# AP Compatibility Release for AP 0.6.5

- Fixes a couple issues preventing this apworld from working in the AP 0.6.5 Environment
Release_1_3_5.title: AP Compatibility Release v1.3.5 | Full
